articles.title: Our Share of Night by Mariana Enríquez review - political horror
articles.description: Set in the decades during and after Argentina’s military dictatorship, this occult treatment of the ‘dirty war’ fuses political allegory and gleeful gore
articles.content: In 2017, Things We Lost in the Fire by Argentinian writer Mariana Enríquez introduced a compelling new voice to English readers. Tough-edged and tightly honed, her short stories inhabited the space between high gothic horror and cruel sociopolitical ... [6262 chars]

articles.title: BTS: Jin Is Living The Best Life As He Attends Coldplay Concert In Argentina, Grooves To My Universe
articles.description: BTS singer Jin attended a Coldplay concert in Argentina on Tuesday night (Wednesday morning IST) ahead of his performance of Astronaut.
articles.content: BTS singer Jin landed in Argentina earlier this week and one of the first things he did was attend the Coldplay concert happening in the country. Videos and pictures of Kim Seokjin, who will be dropping his new single Astronaut with the British band ... [1674 chars]

articles.title: Just over 70% of Argentina's 2021/22 soybean crop sold so far - government
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Oct 26 (Reuters) - Soybean producers sold 70.3% of Argentina's 2021/22 crop through last week, the agriculture ministry said on Wednesday.The portion of the soybean crop sold to date underperforms the 74.2% sold during the same period in the 2020/2021 season.Argentina, the world's top exporter of processed soy, harvested 44 million tonnes in the 2021/2022 soybean
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES, Oct 26 (Reuters) - Soybean producers sold 70.3% of Argentina's 2021/22 crop through last week, the agriculture ministry said on Wednesday.
The portion of the soybean crop sold to date underperforms the 74.2% sold during the same period ... [1225 chars]

articles.title: Fitch downgrades Argentina's sovereign credit rating to 'CCC-'
articles.description: Argentina, the world's top exporter of processed soybeans and the No. 3 for corn, has long faced swirling economic crises, with years of high inflation and a lack of confidence in the peso currency. Fitch said capital controls had helped limit flight of dollars from the country but had "not fully staunched outflows".
articles.content: Ratings agency Fitch on Wednesday downgraded Argentina's long-term sovereign credit rating by a notch to 'CCC-' from 'CCC', citing deep macroeconomic imbalances and rising risks over the country's ability to meet future debt repayments. Argentina, wh... [1869 chars]

articles.title: Rains give Argentine soy a needed boost as planting begins
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Oct 26 (Reuters) - Much-needed rain brought timely relief to drought-plagued farmlands in Argentina's main agricultural region on Wednesday, experts said, boosting prospects just as planting begins for the country's critical soybean crop.Up to 100 millimeters (3.9 inches) of water fell in some areas in the past 24 hours, with much of the country's most important

articles.title: Soccer-England to face Brazil in women's 'Finalissima' at Wembley in April 2023
articles.description:
European champions England will take on Copa America winners Brazil in the inaugural women's "Finalissima" at London's Wembley Stadium on April 6 next year, UEFA announced on Wednesday.
The first men's Finalissima was won by Argentina, with Lionel Messi inspiring the South Americans to a 3-0 win over Euro winners Italy in London in June.
articles.content: European champions England will take on Copa America winners Brazil in the inaugural women's "Finalissima" at London's Wembley Stadium on April 6 next year, UEFA announced on Wednesday. England beat Germany in the European Championship final in July ... [635 chars]

articles.title: BTS’ Jin arrives in Argentina, apologises to ARMY for using private airport exit after crowds throng building: ‘I was afraid you might get hurt’
articles.description: BTS' Jin was greeted by huge crowds at the airport in Argentina, and had to use another exit.
articles.content: Argentina turned purple to warmly welcome BTS’ eldest vocalist, Jin (Kim Seokjin), who is in the city to perform his new single Astronaut with Coldplay. However, there was such a crowd awaiting a glimpse of the star that he had to use the private exi... [1439 chars]
